title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
Hey guy's 

working on 820 2936 with water damage around SMC, q5300, Q5310, U6990 and u2800 ! 

Trace already fixed: Pin1 R5301 to pin4 Q4260, U6990  and pin2 q3200 to pin2 r2578. 

i already replace ISL6259 and Replace SMC from donor board!! No changes, 12.32V on PPBus, SMC not running.. what more could be the problem of 12.30v?

regard's

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
Did you even check basic signals and power for SMC?
Next, check SMC_RESET_L and SMC_PM_G2_EN.

Is 3V42 present?

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
3V42 - 3.42V 
SMC_RESET_L - 3.4V
SMC_PM_G2_EN - 0.200V 

when you say basic signals for you Which are they?

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
U4900 (3 of 3), page 45.

3V at pins 12/13 of U7000?
SMC_BC_ACOK present?

Also check RTC signals and 32KHz from U2800.

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
3.4v on pins 12/13 . 

SMC_BC_ACOK - 0.606V 

and also check RTC signals- 3.4V and 32kHz OK!

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
"SMC_BC_ACOK - 0.606V"
It is bad...

Post other voltages of U7000.
Resolder all the pads around chip.

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message: Ok 2informaticos!! thank you for your's reply's! i will resolder and double check on dead spots if missing any trace!! i will pos the results!!

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
coming back to this, and what solve the problem was replace 51125! On this moment the machines turn's on but show this errors on ASD testes! 

[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-ndgFdoxmL5qRc0CpkqaplzaDmeHUnup/view?usp=sharing[/url] 

can you advice me what can be?? thanks

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
VP0R should be SMC_PBUS_VSENSE I think.
Check Q5300 area.

IO0R is probably related with U5360, or maybe U5400/10.

Th1H is related with Q/U5520.

Do you get more errors?

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
VP0R - Fixed - (replacing Q5300)

IO'R - Fixed - (Replacing u5410)

TH1H - non Fixed !! already replace u5520, R5520 = ok and traces, R5521/22 = ok and traces! (This area don't have any corrusion). already replace Q5520 and check traces to u5520 it's ok and for descharge i solder 2 wires on respective traces! but fan it's always on high! 

I have one more error! - ERROR - MOTOR IS SPINING SLOWER THAN IT SHOULD  - test failed - 


thans

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
Bad trackpad board/flex also cause high fan spin.
Do you get any related error on ASD?

Even ALS issue can cause that.
Check J3402 and its traces.
Also try known good LCD assembly.

title: 820 2936, Water damage, no green Light 12.30V on PPBUS
message:
already test this board in other working mac (2012), and no changes! Fan sill working in  maximum! 

the only errors i have is TH1H AND this: 

[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YMHr6rt1loALq7D03BVuirdSYruJMdNm/view?usp=sharing[/url]

ALS ? what you mean? 

J3402 checked and it seems to me that it's okay. 

in this moment i only have a 3115 board working to compare values!
